|type  = Genshin Impact
}}
'''Items''' in ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' are individual objects or units that players can obtain. Most items can be accessed from the [[Inventory]] or [[Archive]], while others can only be seen in [[Menus]].

==General Items==
[[File:Item Gladiator's Nostalgia.png|100px|thumb|right|[[Gladiator's Nostalgia]]]]
* '''[[Artifacts]]''' - Equipments used to increase the [[Attributes]] of [[characters]].
* '''[[Namecards]]''' - Backgrounds used to display in the Player [[Profile]].
* '''[[Weapons]]''' - Equipment used by characters to attack.
* '''[[Character Development Items]]''' - Items used to upgrade characters.
* '''[[Food]]''' - Items characters and the [[Party]] can be fed with obtain buffs.
* '''[[Potions]]''' - Items that can add buffs to the Party.
* '''[[Fishing Rods]]''' - Rods used to go [[Fishing]].
* '''[[Furnishings]]''' - Objects that can be placed in the [[Serenitea Pot]].
* '''[[Gadgets]]''' - Tools used by the player to interact with the world.
* '''[[Materials]]''' - Items found in the world used to upgrade characters or create other items.
* '''[[Quest Items]]''' - Items obtained during [[Quests]] to submit or keep.
{{clr}}

==Precious Items==
[[File:Item Fragile Resin.png|100px|thumb|right|[[Fragile Resin]]]]
{{Main|Precious Items}}
* '''[[Adventure Items]]''' - Items found during [[exploration]] to submit.
* '''[[Bundles]]''' - Packs of items bought or earned
* '''[[Currencies]]''' - Items used to exchange for other items.
* '''[[Reliquary]]''' - Items uses to obtain [[Artifacts]].
* '''[[Sigils]]''' - Items found during exploration unique to each [[region]] that can be exchanged.
* '''[[Very Special Item]]''' - [[Birthday]] Cake for the [[Traveler]].
* '''[[Wishing Items]]''' - Currencies used to perform [[Wishes]].
{{clr}}

==Other Items==
[[File:Item Story Key.png|100px|thumb|right|[[Story Key]]]]
* '''[[Story Key]]''' - Item used to unlock [[Story Quests]].
* '''[[Original Resin]]''' - Item used to obtain rewards from [[Ley Line Blossom]]s and [[Irminsul]] Trees in [[Domains]].
* '''[[Chests]]''' - Objects found in the open world containing items.
* '''[[Components]]''' - Objects placed during the [[Divine Ingenuity]] event.
* '''[[Constellation Activation Materials]]''' - Items used to activate [[Constellations]] of characters.
* '''[[Consumables]]''' - Items that can only be used once.
* '''[[Event Items]]''' - Items obtained ruing [[Events]] that expire at the end of the event.
* '''[[Minerals]]''' - Rocks and Ore.
{{clr}}
